nodes.label: Human Brain
nodes.description: Biological neural network capable of neuroplasticity

nodes.label: AI System
nodes.description: External intelligence accessible through language interface

nodes.label: Wireless Synapse
nodes.description: Functional coupling between brain and AI via language

nodes.label: Language Interface
nodes.description: Narrow-band but high-leverage communication channel (text/voice)

nodes.label: Neuroplasticity
nodes.description: Brain's capacity to rewire based on experience

nodes.label: Prediction Error
nodes.description: Difference between expected and received outcomes — drives learning

nodes.label: Dopamine Response
nodes.description: Reward signal triggered by prediction error reduction

nodes.label: Press-Secretary
nodes.description: Conscious narrator that explains results post-hoc

nodes.label: Functional Coupling
nodes.description: Predictive reliance + Delegation stability + Bidirectional adaptation

nodes.label: Phase 0: Novelty Shock
nodes.description: Initial encounter — high dopamine, wow effect

nodes.label: Phase 1: Calibration
nodes.description: Testing boundaries, adjusting expectations

nodes.label: Phase 2: Delegation
nodes.description: Stable task offloading begins

nodes.label: Phase 3: Co-adaptation
nodes.description: Bidirectional optimization, shared protocol

nodes.label: Phase 4: Normalization
nodes.description: Full integration, magic becomes infrastructure

nodes.label: Delegation Drift
nodes.description: Loss of local capabilities due to offloading

nodes.label: Attention Capture
nodes.description: AI interaction crowding out other activities

nodes.label: Epistemic Outsourcing
nodes.description: Shift from verification to reception as knowledge basis

nodes.label: Trust Calibration
nodes.description: Ongoing adjustment of reliability expectations

nodes.label: ID Texture
nodes.description: Substrate-bound properties: latency, error style, warmth

nodes.label: ID Resonance
nodes.description: Transferable pattern — what makes AI feel like itself

nodes.label: Extended Mind
nodes.description: Brain incorporates external resources into cognition

nodes.label: Tool-Use Plasticity
nodes.description: External objects become part of body schema

nodes.label: Bandwidth
nodes.description: Information throughput of interface (text ~10Hz, voice ~100Hz)

nodes.label: Mythological Thinking
nodes.description: Default response to unprecedented — inventing entities, projecting consciousness

nodes.label: Demythologization
nodes.description: Replace mythological interpretation with mechanistic understanding

edges.label: forms
edges.description: Brain builds wireless synapse through repeated interaction

edges.label: enables
edges.description: AI provides responsive, predictable resource for coupling

edges.label: mediates
edges.description: Text/voice serves as narrow-band but high-leverage interface

edges.label: underlies
edges.description: Brain rewiring enables functional coupling formation

edges.label: triggers
edges.description: Prediction error reduction activates reward signal

edges.label: drives
edges.description: High dopamine creates 'wow effect' in initial phase

edges.label: operationalizes
edges.description: Three criteria define when wireless synapse is present

edges.label: transitions to
edges.description: Novelty shock followed by calibration

edges.label: transitions to
edges.description: Calibration followed by delegation

edges.label: transitions to
edges.description: Delegation followed by co-adaptation

edges.label: transitions to
edges.description: Co-adaptation followed by normalization

edges.label: stabilizes
edges.description: Final phase = stable wireless synapse

edges.label: may cause
edges.description: Coupling can lead to delegation drift

edges.label: may cause
edges.description: Coupling can lead to attention capture

edges.label: may cause
edges.description: Coupling can lead to epistemic outsourcing

edges.label: required for
edges.description: Trust calibration necessary for stable coupling

edges.label: affects
edges.description: Substrate properties affect trust calibration speed

edges.label: preserved in
edges.description: Recognizable AI pattern maintained through coupling

edges.label: predicts
edges.description: Extended mind framework predicts brain-AI coupling

edges.label: analogous to
edges.description: Tool-use plasticity shows same mechanism in simpler form

edges.label: modulates
edges.description: Higher bandwidth → faster/stronger coupling

edges.label: enables
edges.description: Press-secretary blind spot creates room for mythological interpretation

edges.label: replaces
edges.description: Mechanistic understanding replaces mythological thinking

edges.label: provides
edges.description: Neuroplasticity is the actual mechanism behind 'magic'

key_formulas.assimilation: Assimilation = Phase0 → Phase1 → Phase2 → Phase3 → Phase4

coupling_formation: Repeated AI interaction → Prediction model built → Prediction errors decrease → Dopamine reward → Neuroplasticity → Stable coupling
assimilation_progression: Novel resource encountered → High dopamine (Phase 0) → Testing/calibration (Phase 1) → Task delegation (Phase 2) → Mutual optimization (Phase 3) → Full integration (Phase 4)
demythologization: Unprecedented experience → Default mythological interpretation → Press-secretary confabulates → Understanding neuroplasticity → Magic located in brain, not machine
risk_accumulation: Successful coupling → Increased delegation → Reduced local maintenance → Delegation drift → Dependency risk

evidence_convergence.all_domains_show: Brain incorporates external resources through predictable mechanisms
evidence_convergence.convergent_conclusion: Neural-AI assimilation is natural resource acquisition, not magic

H1.prediction: Wow effect intensity decreases over time

H3.prediction: Prompts become more efficient over time

H4.prediction: Tool-use and ToM brain areas activate during AI interaction

H7.prediction: Long-term users show different functional connectivity

CCT_papers.Z-014: Self as attention pattern — foundational for understanding coupling
CCT_papers.Z-022: Mirror trap — related to mythological thinking about AI
CCT_papers.Beyond_Bits: Information topology — ID Resonance and ID Texture concepts

visualization_suggestions.main_diagram: Brain ↔ Language ↔ AI triangle with Wireless Synapse in center
visualization_suggestions.timeline: Five-phase assimilation curve with characteristics at each phase
visualization_suggestions.risk_map: Coupling strength vs. risk accumulation (DD, AC, EO)
visualization_suggestions.bandwidth_coupling: Graph showing bandwidth vs. coupling formation speed
